imageAssets.description: A simple, friendly, and cheerful happy face icon or illustration suitable for a dark theme background. It should be clearly recognizable as a happy face.
imageAssets.purpose: Default happy face image displayed on app load.

imageAssets.description: A cartoonish, clearly grumpy or sad face icon, suitable for a dark theme. It should be visually distinct from the existing happy face, perhaps using cooler colors like blues or purples, with a frown and downturned eyes. Style should be simple, friendly, and cheerful (ironically for a grumpy face) to match the existing happy face art style. Transparent background if possible, otherwise a background that blends with a dark game canvas (#0d1117).
imageAssets.purpose: Obstacle/penalty item in the 'Happy Face Catch' game. Player should avoid catching this.

imageAssets.description: A friendly, inviting 'catcher' element for the game. This could be a stylized wide basket, a pair of cute cartoon hands open upwards, or a simple, sleek platform. It should look like it's meant to catch things. Colors should complement the dark theme and stand out slightly. Style should be simple and cheerful, matching the existing happy face art style. Transparent background if possible.
imageAssets.purpose: Player-controlled element at the bottom of the screen used to catch falling happy faces.

imageAssets.description: A special 'power-up' item, visually exciting. Could be a sparkling golden version of the existing happy face, or a bright, cheerful star icon. It needs to look distinctly beneficial and attractive. Style should be simple and cheerful, matching the existing happy face art style, but with added 'shine' or 'glow' elements. Transparent background if possible.
imageAssets.purpose: Collectible power-up item in the 'Happy Face Catch' game that grants a bonus.
